required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Sestrin Levels in Patients With Endometriosis
clinical_study.official_title: The Sestrin Levels in Patients With Endometriosis

lead_sponsor.agency: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

clinical_study.source: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: Serum sestrin levels of endometriosis patients are compared with a group of healthy volunteers of the same age.

detailed_description.textblock: Serum sestrin levels are compared with 45 endometriosis patients and 45 healthy volunteers of the same age. The energy metabolism of the endometriosis group and its possible relationship with the endometriosis stage will be compared since sestrin gives information about the energy metabolism of the people.

primary_outcome.measure: Serum sestrin levels in women with endometriosis
primary_outcome.description: Serum sestrin levels involved in inflammation and energy metabolism are compared between endometriosis and healthy control group.

secondary_outcome.measure: Comparison of the relationship between serum sestrin level and endometriosis stage
secondary_outcome.description: By comparing the relation of serum sestrin level with the stage of endometriosis, its relation with serum level in patients with advanced and early stage endometriosis will be examined. The possible effect of sestrin on disease pathogenesis will be examined.

arm_group.description: It consists of women between the ages of 18-45 who have been diagnosed with endometriosis by surgery or ultrasonography.
It consists of healty women between the ages of 18-45

intervention.description: Serum sestrin levels involved in inflammation and energy metabolism are compared between endometriosis and healthy control group.

study_pop.textblock: The serum sestrin level of women between the ages of 18-45 who have been diagnosed with endometriosis by surgery or ultrasound will be compared with the level of women of the same age.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- diagnosed with endometriosis (Surgery or ultrasound)
- Women without endometriosis
Exclusion Criteria:
- Women without endometriosis
- women who are only suspected endometriosis

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital
